objects.text:
• Premium PU Leather
• Spacious Interior
• Versatile Design

product_details.description: MATERIAL: High quality PU Leather fabric and polyester lined make the hand feel more comfortable, smooth metal zipper and High quality hardware make the crossbody bag more elegant and durable. CAPACITY: 10.2" x 6.7" x 3.9". Includes one interior slot and one interior zip pocket.The spacious space can accommodate wallets, cosmetics, skin care products, keys, sunglasses and mobile phones of various sizes, etc. This retro purse meet most of your needs to store daily supplies. DESIGN: Hobo style design, simple, cute and fashionable.Easy to match with all clothes in your wardrobe, Underarm mini bag is must-have collection for all stylish vegan ladies . USE OCCASION: This classic and stylish tote handbag or shoulder bag is the best choice for women to travel. This shoulder purse is ideal for working, dating, party, evening, shopping, traveling, beach and other activities. The best Present choice for ladies. Awesome Present choice for women on Birthday, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas, Graduation.Take the tote and start your own chic fashion journey. As a professional manufacture,we can offer OEM/ODM as customer's request. Fabric type - Polyester ** Origin - Made in the USA or Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Polyester ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
The banner showcases a stylish product promotion targeting fashion-conscious customers. The layout is split into two sections: a left panel with all textual content and design elements, and a right panel displaying a high-quality handbag image. The left side includes bold headline text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in a clean white font to emphasize the product type. Beneath it lies a set of bullet-point features ("description") communicating key details. A striking price is displayed prominently using "price" in a gold hue, followed by a noticeable call-to-action button ("cta") backed by a colored rectangle ("cta_background"). The dark gradient-to-muted beige background, paired with decorative wave lines and golden dots, enhances sophistication and visual balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Ebony (#1f1f1f)
- Graphite Grey (#333333)
- Gold (#d4af37)
- Off-white Beige (#f0e6d2)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a sleek black handbag with a minimalist and elegant design. The dominant color is a rich, matte black (Hex: #1C1C1C), providing a luxurious and timeless appeal. Subtle highlights and shadows blend seamlessly with darker tones to add depth and texture to the leather surface. A touch of metallic gold (Hex: #D4AF37) from the zipper adds sophistication and contrast, drawing the viewer's attention. These elements are well-balanced, creating a refined and polished look. For an advertisement banner, a palette of Black (#1C1C1C), Gold (#D4AF37), Charcoal Gray (#3A3A3A), and White (#FFFFFF) would deliver a classy, modern aesthetic.
